statements: SELECT * FROM comedy_material;
SELECT joke_id, joke_text FROM comedy_material WHERE comedy_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM comedy_material WHERE script_id = 10 ORDER BY date_added DESC;
SELECT joke_id, joke_text FROM comedy_material WHERE date_added >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT joke_text FROM comedy_material WHERE script_id = 5 AND comedy_rating IS NULL ORDER BY joke_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM comedy_material WHERE jest_id = 24 ORDER BY date_added DESC;
SELECT joke_id, joke_text, comedy_rating FROM comedy_material WHERE script_id = 10 AND comedy_rating > 3 ORDER BY comedy_rating ASC, date_added DESC;
SELECT joke_text, script_id FROM comedy_material WHERE comedy_rating BETWEEN 1 AND 5 AND date_added >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY script_id ASC, date_added DESC;
SELECT joke_id, comedy_rating FROM comedy_material WHERE date_added BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY joke_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM comedy_material WHERE joke_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND comedy_rating IS NOT NULL ORDER BY date_added ASC;
SELECT * FROM jokes;
SELECT joke_text FROM jokes WHERE joke_id = 1;
SELECT joke_id, joke_text FROM jokes WHERE joke_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM scripts;
SELECT script_text FROM scripts WHERE script_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM jokes WHERE joke_id = 1;
SELECT joke_text FROM jokes ORDER BY joke_id DESC;
SELECT joke_id, joke_text FROM jokes WHERE joke_id > 5 AND joke_text LIKE '%funny%';
SELECT joke_text FROM jokes WHERE LENGTH(joke_text) > 50;
SELECT * FROM scripts WHERE script_text LIKE '%dramatic%' ORDER BY script_id ASC;
SELECT joke_id, joke_text, joke_category FROM jokes
SELECT * FROM scripts WHERE script_id = 1
SELECT script_title, script_content FROM scripts ORDER BY script_title DESC
SELECT joke_id, joke_text FROM jokes WHERE joke_category = 'Puns'
SELECT material_id, material_type FROM comedy_material
SELECT joke_text, joke_category FROM jokes WHERE joke_category = 'Puns' ORDER BY joke_id DESC;
SELECT script_title, script_content FROM scripts WHERE script_id > 100 AND script_id < 200 ORDER BY script_id ASC;
SELECT material_type, material_content FROM comedy_material WHERE material_type LIKE '%Stand-up%' ORDER BY material_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM jokes JOIN scripts ON jokes.joke_category = scripts.script_title ORDER BY jokes.joke_id, scripts.script_id;
SELECT joke_text, script_content FROM jokes JOIN scripts ON jokes.joke_id = scripts.script_id WHERE jokes.joke_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM jokes
SELECT joke_text, joke_id FROM jokes WHERE joke_id = 1
SELECT script_title FROM scripts ORDER BY script_id DESC
SELECT comedian_name, comedian_age FROM comedians ORDER BY comedian_age ASC
SELECT material_type, material_content FROM comedy_material WHERE material_type = 'stand-up'
SELECT joke_text FROM jokes WHERE joke_id = 1;
SELECT script_title, script_content FROM scripts WHERE script_id = 3;
SELECT comedian_name, comedian_age FROM comedians WHERE comedian_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM comedy_material WHERE material_type = 'stand-up';
SELECT comedian_name, comedian_age FROM comedians ORDER BY comedian_age DESC;

SELECT joke_text FROM jokes WHERE joke_id = 1;
SELECT script_title, script_content FROM scripts WHERE script_id = 3;
SELECT material_title, material_content FROM comedy_material ORDER BY material_id DESC;

SELECT joke_text FROM jokes ORDER BY joke_id DESC;
SELECT script_title, script_content FROM scripts WHERE script_id = 2;
